sub_topic: Prove that the Cartesian product of two sets is not associative with respect to union.
message_1: Let A = {1} and B = {2,3}. Find (A x B) ∪ (B x A) and (A ∪ B) x A, and verify that they are not equal, thus proving that Cartesian product of two sets is not associative with respect to union.
